thread.section_title: Holiday Inn Express Earls Court - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Decent in terms of everything.
thread.title_full: Decent in terms of everything. - Review of Holiday Inn Express Earls Court, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: H17K
title: Decent in terms of everything.
text:
Easy access by bus and tube. Nearest bus stop is across the road. Friendly staff and efficient. Breakfast was included and basic selection is served. The breakfast area at the lobby can be quite cramp as tour group tends to dine at same time. Rooms are clean and the size are pretty decent in London. Ice machine can be found at the lobby and tea making facilities in room are complete. The washroom doesn't come with a tub but the shower is good enough. Definitely a good property to choose when you're up for a quick visit to London!
Room Tip: Better room in next building. See more room tips
